title: Traditional Chinese medicine widely acknowledged, extolled in US
cleaned_text: train customized for Mexico City rolls off assembly line in Hunan](/a/202309/11/WS64fe706ca310d2dce4bb50a4.html) Traditional Chinese medicine widely acknowledged, extolled in US chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2022-11-22 13:21 Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) has at least 2,000 years of history. It can treat arthritis, back pain, gastrointestinal disorders, anxiety, infertility, et cetera, and is being broadly recognized and acclaimed in the US. In an interview with China Daily, experts said TCM provides well-rounded benefits to the patients and conventional health system.
